subtitle: A barbecue recipe that the whole family will enjoy.

method.text: In a shallow dish, mix together lemon juice, sugar, ketchup, Worcestershire sauce, garlic and seasoning. Add chicken quarters to the dish. Toss well in the sauce to coat and leave to marinate overnight.
Remove chicken from marinade, place over barbecue and cook for 40-50 min basting frequently with the leftover marinade until golden and tender. Serve immediately.

title: Devilled chicken thighs with warm pepper salad
